text: Harry F. Hemond is an American engineer, focusing on environmental chemistry and wetland chemistry. He is currently the William E. Leonhard Professor at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology faculty Category:21st-century American engineers Category:Worcester Polytechnic Institute alumni Category:Connecticut College alumni Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology alumni
title: Harry Hemond
